SELECT rnum, host_id as hostId, host_ip as hostIp, host_pt as hostPt, host_nm as hostNm, use_yn as useYn, last_mdfr_nm as lastMdfrNm, last_mdfcn_dttm as lastMdfcnDttm FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, host_id, host_ip, host_pt, host_nm, use_yn, last_mdfr_nm, last_mdfcn_dttm FROM ( SELECT host_id, host_ip, host_pt, host_nm, use_yn, last_mdfr_nm, last_mdfcn_dttm FROM host WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY host_id ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT host_id as hostId, host_ip as hostIp, host_pt as hostPt, host_nm as hostNm, use_yn as useYn, last_mdfr_nm as lastMdfrNm, last_mdfcn_dttm as lastMdfcnDttm FROM host WHERE host_id = #{hostId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOST(host_id, host_ip, host_pt, host_nm, last_mdfr_nm, last_mdfcn_dttm) VALUES('HOST'||LPAD(SEQ_HOST.NEXTVAL, 8, '0'), #{hostIp}, #{hostPt}, #{hostNm}, 'admin', sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE host SET host_ip = #{hostIp}, host_pt = #{hostPt}, host_nm = #{hostNm}, last_mdfcn_dttm = sysdate WHERE host_id = #{hostId}
UPDATE host SET use_yn = 'N' WHERE host_id = #{hostId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT h.host_id as hostId, h.host_nm as hostNm, h.host_ip as hostIp, h.host_pt as hostPt FROM host h JOIN bat_grp bg ON h.host_id = bg.host_id WHERE bg.bat_grp_id = #{batGrpId}
